result.title: Just Another Contest [Tutorial]
result.content:
D: March Rain

Let's simplify the problem to be given l (the length of the strip), output "YES" if Youssef can keep his house safe, otherwise print "NO".

How?

We can solve this new problem in O(n) .. first let the strip starts with the first hole and iterate over these holes and if this strip can't cover the i - th hole increase the answer by 1 and update the strip to start with this i-th hole.

Code
bool valid(long long l){
	long long to = strip[0] - 1;
	int ans = 0;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){
		if (strip[i] > to)
			++ans, to = strip[i] + l - 1;
	}
	return (ans <= k);
}

So we can validate the answer in just O(n).

If the answer is "YES" for l so it's "YES" , it's a monotonic function then you can binary search for this x and the validation function is the above code, the complexity is O(nlog(n)).
